ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "After sanction of the proposals by the Bank, the loan will be released, normally, within five (5) working days after the deposit of promoter contribution by the beneficiary and receipt of subsidy claim, whichever is later. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Upon sanctioning of the loan, Bank will submit the Margin Money Subsidy proposal against the borrowers to a Nodal Bank approved by the Government of Assam. A MOU will be executed by the Finance Department with the Nodal Bank for the release of the Margin money amount to the Financing Bank Branch. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Bank will update the status of the online MIS system of the scheme.
